items.title: Amgen’s Imdylltra wins conditional MHRA licence for lung cancer
items.description: Amgen’s bispecific T-cell engager (BiTE) led to an ORR of 41% in patients with extensive-stage small cell lung cancer.

items.title: Amgen: Blockbusters, Emerging Therapies, And Investment Potential
